_header: Lady of pity for thy sorrows that thou haddest
_description: An epistle to his mistress, signed ‘Chaucer’ — ten stanzas rhyme royal

CamTCC599.First Lines:
Lady of pity for þysorowes þat þu haddestffor Ihesu
                    þy son in tyme of hys passioun…
CamTCC599.Last Lines:
…Manly as Sampson my person to auaunceYet wold I submyt me in
                    your remembraunce
